alert.note: Alert for Inyo (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LasVegas (Southern Nevada, Southeastern California, Northwestern Arizona)
info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued March 10 at 9:07PM PST until March 11 at 12:15AM PST by NWS LasVegas
info.description: The National Weather Service in Las Vegas has issued a * Flash Flood Warning for... Rain and Snowmelt in... Western Inyo County in south central California... * Until 1215 AM PST. * At 907 PM PST, Doppler radar indicated heavy precipitation falling on deep snowpack. HAZARD...Life threatening flash flooding from rain and snowmelt. SOURCE...Doppler radar. IMPACT...Life-threatening flash flooding of low-water crossings, creeks, normally dry washes and roads. * Some locations that will experience flash flooding include... mainly rural areas of Western Inyo County near the Sierra crest This includes the following streams and drainages... South Fork Bishop Creek, South Fork Big Pine Creek, Little Pine Creek, Birch Creek and Big Pine Creek. FLASH FLOOD...OBSERVED FLASH FLOOD DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE
info.instruction: Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding.
